``` {r}
offense_model <- nba_processed %>%
  mutate(Win = as.numeric(`Win/Loss Status` == "W")) %>%  
  glm(
    Win ~ `Three Point Volume` + `Three Pointer Accuracy` + `Two Pointer Accuracy` + `Free Throw Accuracy` + `Assists` + `Offensive Rebounds` + `Turnover` + `Personal Fouls Drawn` + `Blocks Against`,
    data = .,
    family = binomial(link = "logit")
  )

summary(offense_model)
```
